00033 double f_test(double x)
00034 {
00035   return x*x-x+1;
00036 }
00037 double f_test(double x, double y)
00038 {
00039   return (x*x-x+1)*(y*y*y-y*x+1.);
00040 }
00041 
00042 class ParserTest: public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture
00043 {
00044   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( ParserTest );
00045   CPPUNIT_TEST( testSimpleOperation );
00046   CPPUNIT_TEST( testComparaison );
00047   CPPUNIT_TEST( testLogic );

00052   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00053 
00054 public:
00055   ParserTest():CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture::TestFixture()
00056   {
00057     Cerr<<"builder "<<finl;
00058   };
00059   void tearDown()
00060   {
00061 // Cerr<<"ICI" <<finl;
00062   } ;
00063   void test_expr_sol( Nom* expr_sol,int  nb_expr)
00064   {
00065     Parser_U p;
00066     p.setNbVar(0);
00067     for (int i=0; i<nb_expr; i++)
00068       {
00069         Nom expr = expr_sol[2*i];
00070         double resu = atof(expr_sol[2*i+1].getChar());
00071         p.setString(expr);
00072         p.parseString();
00073         Nom pb("pb ");
00074         pb+=expr;
00075         if (i==nb_expr-1)
00076           CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("test fin de liste ",resu!=p.eval());
00077         else
00078           CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL_MESSAGE(pb.getChar(),resu,p.eval(),1e-8);
00079       }
00080 
00081 
00082   } ;
00083   void testSimpleOperation()
00084   {
00085     int nb_expr=19;
00086     Nom expr_sol[] = { "1+1", "2"
00087                        , "2+3*5" , "17"
00088                        , "2+3/5" , "2.6"
00089                        , "3*5+2" , "17"
00090                        , "-3*5+2" , "-13"
00091                        , "-3*(5+2)" , "-21"
00092                        , "3*(-5+2)" , "-9"
00093                        , "3*(-2+2)" , "0"
00094                        , "-6+3*5+(2+3)*3-7*(-2+1)" , "31"
00095                        , "1e2" , "100"
00096                        , "1e-2" , "0.01"
00097                        , "1e+2" , "100"
00098                        , "1E2" , "100"
00099                        , "1E-2*5" , "0.05"
00100                        , "1E+2*5" , "500"
00101                        , "4.^0.5","2"
00102                        , "+3","3"
00103                        ,"-3*2","-6"
00104                        , "1", "0"
00105                      };
00106     test_expr_sol(expr_sol,nb_expr);
00107   };

00109   void testComparaison()
00110   {
00111     int nb_expr=53;
00112     Nom expr_sol[] = { "1<2", "1"
00113                        , "2<1", "0"
00114                        , "1<1", "0"
00115                        , "1>2", "0"
00116                        , "2>1", "1"
00117                        , "2>2", "0"
00118                        , "2[1", "0"
00119                        , "1[2", "1"
00120                        , "2[2", "1"

00122                        , "1]2", "0"
00123                        , "2]2", "1"
00124                        , "(1<2)+1", "2"
00125                        , "(1<2)+1", "2"
00126                        , "(1<2)+1", "2"
00127                        , "(1<2)+1", "2"
00128                        , "1<(2+1)", "1"
00129                        , "1[1", "1"
00130                        , "1>2", "0"
00131                        , "1]2", "0"
00132                        , "-1<2", "1"
00133                        , "1<(-2)", "0"
00134                        , "-2<1", "1"
00135                        ,"1_LT_2", "1"
00136                        , "2_LT_1", "0"
00137                        , "1_LT_1", "0"
00138                        , "1_GT_2", "0"
00139                        , "2_GT_1", "1"
00140                        , "2_GT_2", "0"
00141                        , "2_LE_1", "0"
00142                        , "1_LE_2", "1"
00143                        , "2_LE_2", "1"
00144                        , "2_GE_1", "1"
00145                        , "1_GE_2", "0"
00146                        , "2_GE_2", "1"
00147                        , "(1_LT_2)+1", "2"
00148                        , "(1_LT_2)+1", "2"
00149                        , "(1_LT_2)+1", "2"
00150                        , "(1_LT_2)+1", "2"
00151                        , "1_LT_(2+1)", "1"
00152                        , "1_LE_1", "1"
00153                        , "1_GT_2", "0"
00154                        , "1_GE_2", "0"
00155                        , "-1_LT_2", "1"
00156                        , "1_LT_(-2)", "0"
00157                        , "-2_LT_1", "1"
00158                        ,"(1)_MAX_(-1.)","1."
00159                        ,"99._max_101.","101."
00160                        ,"1._min_(-1.)","-1."
00161                        ,"99._min_101.","99."
00162                        ,"12_mod_2","0"
00163                        , "11%3","2"
00164                        , "1", "0"
00165                      };
00166     test_expr_sol(expr_sol,nb_expr);
00167   };

00170   {
00171 
00172 
00173     int nb_expr=9;
00174     Nom expr_sol[] = { "COS(0)", "1"
00175                        , "SIN(0.)" , "0"
00176                        , "COS(0.1)*COS(0.1)+SIN(0.1)*SIN(0.1)" , "1"
00177                        , "EXP(LN(2))" , "2"
00178                        , "INT(1.123)" , "1"
00179                        , "INT(-1.123)" , "-1"
00180                        , "Abs(-1.3)","1.3"
00181                        , "Abs(7.9)","7.9"
00182                        , "1", "0"
00183                      };

00189   void testLogic()
00190   {
00191 
00192 
00193     int nb_expr=15;
00194     Nom expr_sol[] = { "1_and_1", "1"
00195                        ,     "1_AnD_0", "0"
00196                        ,     "0_AND_0", "0"
00197                        ,     "1_OR_1", "1"
00198                        ,     "1_OR_0", "1"
00199                        ,     "0_OR_0", "0"
00200                        ,     "(1+2)_EQ_3", "1"
00201                        ,     "(1+2)_NEQ_10", "1"
00202                        ,     "(1+2)_NEQ_3", "0"
00203                        ,     "(1+2)_EQ_10", "0"
00204                        ,     "(1_EQ_1)_AND_((2-3)_EQ_(-1))", "1"
00205                        ,     "(1_EQ_0)_AND_((2-3)_EQ_(-1))", "0"
00206                        ,     "NOT(12)", "0"
00207                        ,     "NOT(0)", "1"
00208                        , "1", "0"
00209                      };
00210     test_expr_sol(expr_sol,nb_expr);
00211   };
00212   void testFunction()
00213   {
00214     Parser_U p;
00215     p.setNbVar(0);
00216 
00217     UserUnaryFunction f;
00218     Nom nom="f";
00219     Nom var="x";
00220     Nom expr_f="x*x-x+1";
00221     f.setFunction(nom, var, expr_f);
00222     p.addFunc(f);
00223 
00224 
00225     for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
00226       {
00227         Nom expr="f(";
00228         expr+=Nom(i);
00229         expr+=Nom(")");
00230         p.setString(expr);
00231         p.parseString();
00232         Nom pb("Pb test ");
00233         pb+=expr;
00234 
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE(pb.getChar(),f_test(i),p.eval());
00236       }
00237   };
00238 
00239   void testVar()
00240   {
00241     Parser_U p;
00242     p.setNbVar(2);
00243     p.addVar("x");
00244     p.addVar("y");
00245 
00246     Nom expr="(x*x-x+1)*(y*Y*y-y*X+1.)";
00247     p.setString(expr);
00248     p.parseString();
00249 
00250 
00251     for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
00252       {
00253         for (int j=0; j<10; j++)
00254           {
00255             p.setVar("x",i);
00256             p.setVar("y",j);
00257             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("Pb ",f_test(i,j),p.eval());
00258           }
00259       }
00260     /*
00261       on devrait avoir une erreur dans ce bloc */
00262     Parser_U p2;
00263     Nom pb("2x");
00264     p2.setNbVar(1);
00265     p2.addVar("x");
00266     p2.setString(pb);
00267     p2.setVar("x",0);
00268     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW_MESSAGE("verification que 2x ne marche pas", p2.parseString(),TriouError);
00269     Parser_U p3;
00270     p3.setNbVar(3);
00271     p3.addVar("x");
00272     p3.addVar("y");
00273 // pour le moment on ne bloque pas
00274 // CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW_MESSAGE("verification que ajouter x  ne marche pas si on a deja x", p3.addVar("x"),TriouError);
00275   };
00276   void testSyntaxe()
00277   {
00278     Parser_U p;
00279     p.setNbVar(2);
00280     p.addVar("x");
00281     p.addVar("y");
00282 
00283     Nom expr="(12,34*2)";
00284     p.setString(expr);
00285     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW_MESSAGE("verification que 12,34*2 ne marche pas", p.parseString(),TriouError);
00286     expr="(12,34e+4)";
00287     p.setString(expr);
00288     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW_MESSAGE("verification que 12,34e4 ne marche pas", p.parseString(),TriouError);
00289     expr="(1234e+1,4)";
00290     p.setString(expr);
00291     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW_MESSAGE("verification que 1234e1,4 ne marche pas", p.parseString(),TriouError);
00292 
00293   };
00294 
00295 };
